resources.string: makes Spotify your main music provider
makes Apple music your main music provider
makes Anghami your main music provider
makes Deezer your main music provider
makes Youtube Music your main music provider
I will try to redirect all links to the preferred music provider

\1 - Go to the settings and find this app and enable all the links (EXCEPT the music app you use daily)

So If you use Spotify. do not enable Spotify link of this app
(This is to prevent this app opening if you click Spotify link)


2 - If you have other music APPS in your phone. Go to their settings and turn off their links.
EX:
So If you have both Apple Music app and Spotify. and you use Spotify for your music

Turn off apple music links from the phone settings.
Or delete the app that works too :)
Search for Albums or Playlist\n(If off I will open the original App)
